SKT_FIRST.name: Chilling, Isn't It?
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases when the caster is granted a buff.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\nこのスキルは自分に強化効果がある場合、ダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 지속되는 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color>을 부여합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신이 강화 효과 보유 시 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的几率造成<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n自身附带强化效果时,该技能伤害量提升。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Shocked Chance +50%\nInflicts an additional Shocked for 2 turns
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 感電発生率+50%\n感電2ターン追加
SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 触电触发几率+50%\n额外造成2回合触电效果

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 弱体効果の持続ターン+1ターン
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 弱化效果持续时间+1回合

SKT_BURST_3.effect: <color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>\nResets all skill cooldowns\nHelp Me, Sis guaranteed activation
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: <color=#FFBF00>強化攻撃</color>\n全スキルのスキルターン初期化\n【助けて、お姉さん!】が必ず発動
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: <color=#FFBF00>강화 공격</color>\n모든 스킬 쿨타임 초기화\n도와줘, 언니! 반드시 발동
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: <color=#FFBF00>强化攻击</color>\n重置所有技能冷却时间\n必定触发姐姐帮我!

SKT_SECOND.name: Help Me, Sis!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Ranger</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Speed. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>, and grants increased Effectiveness to ally <color=#28d9ed>Mages</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Rangers</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)<color=#28d9ed>スピード型</color>の味方が攻撃時、スピードが最も高い敵単体に追加攻撃を与える。攻撃後、自分の行動ゲージが<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>UPし、<color=#28d9ed>魔法型</color>と<color=#28d9ed>スピード型</color>の味方の効果命中を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>속도형</color> 캐릭터가 공격했을 때 속도가 가장 높은 적에게 추가 공격을 합니다. 공격 후 자신의 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> 증가하며, 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>마법형</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>속도형</color> 캐릭터의 효과 적중을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (触发效果)友军中<color=#28d9ed>速度型</color>角色攻击时,对速度最高的敌人发动额外攻击。攻击后,自身行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>25%</color>,并使友军中<color=#28d9ed>魔法型</color>和<color=#28d9ed>速度型</color>角色的效果命中提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Twin Tornado!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportionally to the number of debuffs inflicted on the target. This skill always has elemental advantage.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体に感電1個を2ターンの間付与し、ダメージを与える。この攻撃は対象の弱体効果の数に応じてダメージがUPする。このスキルは有利属性の攻撃判定になる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 지속되는 <color=#28d9ed>감전</color>을 1회 부여하고 공격합니다. 이 공격은 대상의 약화 효과가 많을수록 피해가 증가합니다. 이 스킬은 항상 유리한 상성으로 적용됩니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 对全体敌人造成1次<color=#28d9ed>触电</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,并攻击。目标附带的弱化效果越多,则该攻击的伤害越高。该技能总是以优势属性施展。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Shocked on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict Shocked for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>感電</color>を2ターンの間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で感電を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 지속되는 감전을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 지속되는 감전을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能起始效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对全体敌人造成触电效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率造成触电效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
